mapper.select: select 'BIOPSY' subject, 'biopsy' id, 'biopsy' name, a.SPCN_COLEC_DT time, a.SPCN_COLEC_DT spcnColecDt, -- 검체체취일자 a.SPCN_NO spcnNo, -- 검체번호 IFNULL(a.ORGAN_CD,'Unknwon') organCd , -- 장기코드 IFNULL(a.ORGAN_SITE_CD,'Unknwon') organSiteCd, -- 장기부위코드 IFNULL(a.DP_SPCN_LOC_CD,'Unknwon') dpSpcnLocCd -- 병리검체위치코드 from pmsdev.SSSPMPSCN a -- 병리검체의뢰기본 join pmsdev.SSSPMORDR b on a.ORDR_NO = b.ORDR_NO and a.EXAM_SN = b.EXAM_SN where b.RESCH_PAT_ID != #{patientId} limit 500
